S.FORM: Miqumicang nataqu'an zaku amu haipi palicia it tukau'un malasbunun bazbaz ca kakaunun.
Miqomicang nataqo'an zako amo haipi palicia it tokao'on malasbonon bazbaz ca kakaonon.
S.TRANSL: 大家好。今天老師要教大家食物的布農語怎麼說。
Hello everyone. Today, I am going to teach you how to say the Bunun language for food.

S.FORM: Maqanciap asu tan'a ki sinbazbaz is tataqu?
Maqanciap aso tan'a ki sinbazbaz is tataqo?
S.TRANSL: Do you understand what the teacher says?

S.FORM: Nii caak maqanciap ti tukua asu. Maqtu mauqnang bazbaz.
Nii caak maqanciap ti tokoa aso. Maqto maoqnang bazbaz.
S.TRANSL: 老師，我不懂。可以再說一次嗎?
I don’t understand. Can you repeat it again?

S.FORM: Nii azak tan'a. Maqtu tatqaitun tukuc ca qalinga?
Nii azak tan'a. Maqto tatqaiton tokoc ca qalinga?
S.TRANSL: 我聽不到，可以大聲一點嗎?
I can’t hear you, can you speak louder?
請看這裡! 跟著我唸一遍。
Look here, please! Repeat after me.

S.FORM: Mauqna'ang bazbaz. Tatqaiti tukuc ca qalinga.
Maoqna'ang bazbaz. Tatqaiti tokoc ca qalinga.
S.TRANSL: Read it again. Please speak louder.

S.FORM: Tataqu', minpungul azak madas is ispapatas.
Tataqo', minpongol azak madas is ispapatas.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my pen.

S.FORM: Tataqu', minpungul azak madas is isqaqaisqais.
Tataqo', minpongol azak madas is isqaqaisqais.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my eraser.

S.FORM: Simula ha'an taszangan suu ki isqaqaisqais.
Simola ha'an taszangan soo ki isqaqaisqais.
S.TRANSL: 請跟旁邊同學借橡皮擦。
Please borrow erasers from your classmates.

S.FORM: Panca'aninti ca pisqancaipan hiip, pasaduu ca mauqnin.
Panca'aninti ca pisqancaipan hiip, pasadoo ca maoqnin.
S.TRANSL: 我們就上到這邊，下週再見。
Class dismissed, see you next week.

S.FORM: Uva'az azak is Balan, tupa'un ca ngaan naak tu Abis.
Uva'az azak is Balan, topa'on ca ngaan naak to Abis.
S.TRANSL: I am the son of Balan, and my name is Abis.

S.FORM: Masisipul azak it Tiang, tupaun tu Batu'.
Masisipol azak it Tiang, topaon to Bato'.
S.TRANSL: I am a student in Tiang, my name is Batu'.

S.FORM: Tukau'un ca ngaan is Tama suu?
Tokao'on ca ngaan is Tama soo?
Balan ca ngaan is Tama naak.
Balan ca ngaan is Tama naak.
Tuqasnanaz naak ca kunan, tupaun tu Takuc.
Toqasnanaz naak ca konan, topaon to Takoc.
S.TRANSL: He's my brother, his name is Takuc.

S.FORM: Uu, Abis ca ngaan i cia.
Uo, Abis ca ngaan i cia.
Nii, takuc ca ngaan i cia.
Nii, takoc ca ngaan i cia.
Kaut ca kunan. Patinaun zaku ca kunan.
Kaot ca konan. Patinaon zako ca konan.
Kaviaz naak ca kunan, tupaun ca ngaan cia tu Ival.
Kaviaz naak ca konan, topaon ca ngaan cia to Ival.
S.TRANSL: 她是我的朋友，她的名字是Ival。
She's a friend of mine, her name is Ival.

S.FORM: Piin ca qamisan i suu hiip.
Piin ca qamisan i soo hiip.
Piin ca qamisan i cia haip.
Piin ca qamisan i cia haip.
Macan qan dusa' ca qamisan i cia haip.
Macan qan dosa' ca qamisan i cia haip.
Piin ca qamisan i Tama suu haip.
Piin ca qamisan i Tama soo haip.
Mahima'unin ca qamisan i Tama naak haip.
Mahima'onin ca qamisan i Tama naak haip.

S.TRANSL: How many brothers and sisters do you have?

S.FORM: Maiza dadusa ca tuqasnau'az, tatina ca naubananaz.
Maiza dadosa ca toqasnao'az, tatina ca naobananaz.
S.TRANSL: 我有兩個姐姐，一個弟弟。
I have two sisters and one brother.
How many people are in your family?
There are four of us in our family.
你的舅舅從事什麼工作?
What does your uncle do for a living?
Does your sister have a job?
他們兩個人是兄弟姐妹嗎?

S.FORM: Bunun amin ca dingalan i suu?
Bonon amin ca dingalan i soo?
Uu, mu'amin ca taitlumaqan naam malungkav.
Uo, mo'amin ca taitlomaqan naam malongkav.
S.TRANSL: Yes, we are all very tall.
Does your sister go to school?
Do your siblings speak the language?
Yes, they speak the ethnic language.
How many brothers and sisters do you have?
I have three brothers and sisters.
你和爸爸媽媽一起住嗎?
Do you live with your parents?

S.FORM: Uu, aluskunanang azak tama tina naak miqumic.
Uo, aloskonanang azak tama tina naak miqomic.
S.TRANSL: 是，我和爸爸媽媽一起住。
Yes, I live with my mom and dad.

S.FORM: Aluskunan asu qudasnanaz ciin qudasnau'az miqumic?
Aloskonan aso qodasnanaz ciin qodasnao'az miqomic?
S.TRANSL: 你和爺爺奶奶一起住嗎?
Do you live with your grandparents?

S.FORM: Nii, nii azak aluskunan nai miqumic.
Nii, nii azak aloskonan nai miqomic.
S.TRANSL: 不，我沒和跟他們一起住。
No, I didn’t live with them.

S.FORM: Maluskun azak tama,tina ciin tuqasnanaz naak miqumic.
Maloskon azak tama,tina ciin toqasnanaz naak miqomic.
S.TRANSL: 我跟爸爸、媽媽、哥哥住在一起。
I live with my father, mother and brother.

S.FORM: Ica'an lamungan ca maiacang i naak.
Ica'an lamongan ca maiacang i naak.
Ica'an lamungan ca acang i naam.
Ica'an lamongan ca acang i naam.

S.TRANSL: 你什麼時候會回去部落?
When are you going back to the tribe?

S.FORM: Mucikaupa pulu'un ca masipula namunlumaq azak.
Mocikaopa polo'on ca masipola namonlomaq azak.
S.TRANSL: I will go back in the summer.
The sun is coming out, it's very hot.
Is it going to be cold outside?

S.FORM: Macisit, pimadai'i ca huluc i mainuk.
Macisit, pimadai'i ca holoc i mainok.
S.TRANSL: It's cold, so wear more clothes.

S.FORM: Masaulval ca diqanin haip i, nitu maklang a nitu makazhav amin.
Masaolval ca diqanin haip i, nito maklang a nito makazhav amin.
S.TRANSL: 今天不冷也不熱，很舒服。
It's neither cold nor hot today, very comfortable.

S.FORM: Makau ca diqanin haip tu sanavan?
Makao ca diqanin haip to sanavan?
Mataisqang ca diqanin, mintasalin ca bintuqan.
Mataisqang ca diqanin, mintasalin ca bintoqan.
S.TRANSL: 天空沒有雲，星星出來了。
There were no clouds in the sky; the stars came out.

S.FORM: Laupang dangza, mintasalin ca vali ciin qaivalval.
Laopang dangza, mintasalin ca vali ciin qaivalval.
S.TRANSL: 雨剛剛停，出了太陽，彩虹出來了。
The rain has just stopped, the sun has come out, the rainbow is coming out.
We're going to have a big storm here.

S.FORM: Macial ca diqanin haan su'uan aiza?
Macial ca diqanin haan so'oan aiza?

S.TRANSL: Very well, out of the big sun.
I have to go to school.

S.FORM: Makazhav ca diqanin, pimadai'i ca huluc i mainuk.
Makazhav ca diqanin, pimadai'i ca holoc i mainok.
S.TRANSL: The weather is very cold, so wear more clothes.

S.FORM: Nasu'zaq ca unin,ka'a tu minpungul madas is talulung.
Naso'zaq ca onin,ka'a to minpongol madas is talolong.
S.TRANSL: 等一下會下大雨，你要記得帶傘。
It's going to rain heavily, you have to remember to bring an umbrella.

S.FORM: Qalna qudanan i bitvaqanin a sangan.
Qalna qodanan i bitvaqanin a sangan.
S.TRANSL: 剛剛打雷了，等一下應該就會下雨。
There was thunder just now, and it's supposed to rain later.
剛剛有下雨，現在雨停了。
It just rained, and now it's stopped.

S.FORM: Maupa' is qainudanan a sangan pang, luvuc ca daan i.
Maopa' is qainodanan a sangan pang, lovoc ca daan i.
S.TRANSL: 好像下過雨了，馬路是濕的。
It seems to have rained and the road is wet.

S.FORM: Qainudanan? makau cuna malmumulung asu ki?
Qainodanan? makao cona malmomolong aso ki?
S.TRANSL: 有下雨嗎?你怎麼全身都濕了?
Is it raining? Why are you all wet?

S.FORM: Qudananin ca nata', nii azak madas is talulung.
Qodananin ca nata', nii azak madas is talolong.
S.TRANSL: 外面在下雨，我沒有帶雨傘。
It's raining outside, so I didn't bring an umbrella.

S.FORM: Macakbit ca bungu i masqa ca hivhiv.
Macakbit ca bongo i masqa ca hivhiv.
S.TRANSL: The wind is blowing so hard that my head hurts.

S.FORM: Qalipacav ca bungu i masqa ca vali.
Qalipacav ca bongo i masqa ca vali.
S.TRANSL: 太陽好大，曬得我頭好暈。
The sun is so big, it makes me dizzy.
I forgot to bring my pen.
I forgot to bring my chopsticks.

S.FORM: Nii azak amin madas, inaqan mabaliv ata.
Nii azak amin madas, inaqan mabaliv ata.
S.TRANSL: I don't have one either, let's go buy one.

S.FORM: Namaipata ata mabaliv is ispapatas qa?
Namaipata ata mabaliv is ispapatas qa?
S.TRANSL: Let's go buy a pen, shall we?

S.FORM: Uu, namabaliv amin azak is isqaqaisqais.
Uo, namabaliv amin azak is isqaqaisqais.
S.TRANSL: Well, I still have to buy erasers.
Let's go get breakfast, shall we?

S.FORM: Bazin nii, mina'unin azak haan lumaq.
Bazin nii, mina'onin azak haan lomaq.
S.TRANSL: No, I've already eaten at home.
I forgot to steam my lunchbox.
I forgot to bring my lunchbox.

S.FORM: Muskun ata ma'un is muqus naak ca!
Moskon ata ma'on is moqos naak ca!
S.TRANSL: 那我們一起吃我的便當吧!
Then let's eat my lunch box together!

S.FORM: Ma'az ca kaunun su'u ca tutusvali?
Ma'az ca kaonon so'o ca totosvali?
S.TRANSL: What are you having for lunch?

S.FORM: Naha'an azak sipulan ma'un is paituqanian.
Naha'an azak sipolan ma'on is paitoqanian.
S.TRANSL: 我要吃學校的營養午餐。
I want a nutritious school lunch.

S.FORM: Ma'az ca kaunun su'u ca tutusvali?
Ma'az ca kaonon so'o ca totosvali?
S.TRANSL: What are you having for lunch?

S.FORM: Timuqus azak haip, muskun ata ma'un ca tutusvali!
Timoqos azak haip, moskon ata ma'on ca totosvali!
S.TRANSL: 我今天有帶便當，我們中午一起吃吧!
I've brought a lunchbox today, let's eat together at noon!
Let's go play basketball, shall we?
Please help me with the broom.
Okay, here's a broomstick for you.

S.FORM: Kadangazing azak siza' is qaqaisqais qa?
Kadangazing azak siza' is qaqaisqais qa?
S.TRANSL: Can you help me with the cloth?

S.FORM: Ma'asikang azak,tupa'i ca Balan tu kadangazi asu siza'.
Ma'asikang azak,topa'i ca Balan to kadangazi aso siza'.
S.TRANSL: I'm sweeping the floor, you ask balan to help you.

S.FORM: Mataqdung sala ca daiseq, qaisqaisi tukuc.
Mataqdong sala ca daiseq, qaisqaisi tokoc.
S.TRANSL: The floor is dirty, go clean it.
Okay, I'll go get the cloth.

S.FORM: Mataqdung sala ca taungkul aiza, qaisqaisi tukuc.
Mataqdong sala ca taongkol aiza, qaisqaisi tokoc.
S.TRANSL: 那個窗戶很髒，去擦一下。
That window is very dirty, go clean it.
等一下，我還沒掃完這裡。
Wait a minute, I'm not done sweeping here yet.
I'm going to see my teacher.
What do you do after school?

S.FORM: Namuskun azak kaviaz i naak tusasauc.
Namoskon azak kaviaz i naak tosasaoc.
S.TRANSL: I'm going to sing with my friends.
May I ask if Aping is home?
She’s at home, please come in.
May I ask if Kaut is home?

S.FORM: Uka' a cia, Ma'az ca iskilim su'u?
Uka' a cia, Ma'az ca iskilim so'o?
S.TRANSL: 她不在，請問你有什麼事?
She's not here, what can I do for you?

S.FORM: Qudasnanaz, Ival azak, tau'ivang ca hilav.
Qodasnanaz, Ival azak, tao'ivang ca hilav.
S.TRANSL: Grandpa, this is Ival, please open the door.

S.FORM: Tiang, Bazai azak, kilim caak su'un paqainan.
Tiang, Bazai azak, kilim caak so'on paqainan.
S.TRANSL: Tiang, I'm Bazai, I've come to play with you.

S.FORM: Uu na, minasaz azak su'un. Maipa'a dii qan pababazbaz!
Uo na, minasaz azak so'on. Maipa'a dii qan pababazbaz!
S.TRANSL: 是啊!我很想念你。快來聊天吧!
Yeah! I miss you so much. Come on, let's chat!
Please sit down and have some tea.

S.FORM: Ua! Macial sala qudan ca savil i muu.
Ua! Macial sala qodan ca savil i moo.
Uu na, macial sala sadu'an ca kukutdaqun mangki.
Uo na, macial sala sado'an ca kokotdaqon mangki.
S.TRANSL: 好喔!這些水果看起來很棒。

S.FORM: Macacakin ca pinitdia tina paitusanavan, mahaiva qan maipadi ma'un.
Macacakin ca pinitdia tina paitosanavan, mahaiva qan maipadi ma'on.
S.TRANSL: 媽媽煮好晚餐了，快來吃吧!
Mom has cooked dinner, come and eat!
Okay, I'll go wash my hands.

S.FORM: Mamauna, cimaqa cuna nitu qalmang tu bunun.
Mamaona, cimaqa cona nito qalmang to bonon.
S.TRANSL: 盡量吃喝，你又不是外人。
Try to eat and drink as much as possible, you're not an outsider.

S.FORM: Mantanin madia ca kaunun zaku, abuqanin.
Mantanin madia ca kaonon zako, aboqanin.
S.TRANSL: I ate a lot, I'm full.

S.FORM: Namatinghiluvin azak, muqnang ickuinin maipati sadu su'un.
Namatinghilovin azak, moqnang ickoinin maipati sado so'on.
S.TRANSL: 我要離開了，下次再來看你。
I'm leaving, I'll see you next time.

S.FORM: Uu, tantungua lumaq naak ca maiza inulu'an.
Uo, tantongoa lomaq naak ca maiza inolo'an.
S.TRANSL: Okay, come to my house sometime.

S.FORM: Miqumicang, nadasun ata haip tataqu' munca'an acang macingav is madadaingaz.
Miqomicang, nadason ata haip tataqo' monca'an acang macingav is madadaingaz.
S.TRANSL: 大家好，老師今天要帶大家去部落訪問耆老。
Hello everyone, today I’m taking you to the tribe to interview the elders.

S.FORM: Uu, namalasbunun azam muskun madadaingaz pababazbaz.
Uo, namalasbonon azam moskon madadaingaz pababazbaz.
S.TRANSL: 好喔!我們要跟耆老說布農語。
Okay! We’re going to speak Bunun to the seniors.
Grandpa, we’ve come to see you.

S.FORM: Paqas! maqanciap qana amu malabununi! mantan macial.
Paqas! maqanciap qana amo malabononi! mantan macial.
S.TRANSL: 你們會說布農語啊!真是太棒了!

S.FORM: Miqumicang, nadasun amu haip tataqu' makamaduq.
Miqomicang, nadason amo haip tataqo' makamadoq.
S.TRANSL: 大家好，老師今天要帶大家去小米田工作。
Hello everyone, today I will take you to work in the millet field.

S.FORM: Mu'amina maipadi masandailaz, ka'a tu minpungul madas is naiskukuza.
Mo'amina maipadi masandailaz, ka'a to minpongol madas is naiskokoza.
S.TRANSL: 大家過來排隊，記得帶好工具。
Come and line up, remember to bring your tools.

S.FORM: Uu, tataqu', mala'aminin ca naiskukuza zami.
Uo, tataqo', mala'aminin ca naiskokoza zami.
S.TRANSL: 是的，老師，我們都拿好工具了。
Yes, sir, we’ve got our tools.
Not yet, it’s still far away.
You go get the bird catcher.

S.FORM: Uu, namaipata azak pusmai kis luqai'.
Uo, namaipata azak posmai kis loqai'.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I’ll go and catch the birds.

S.FORM: Miqumicang, namunca'an ata haip saipukan is tusmumut tantungu.
Miqomicang, namonca'an ata haip saipokan is tosmomot tantongo.
S.TRANSL: 大家好，我們今天要去動物園。
Hello everyone, we are going to the zoo today.
好棒喔!我們要怎麼去呢?
Awesome! How are we going to get there?

S.FORM: Mu'amina macial masandailaz, namabaliv ata kipu'.
Mo'amina macial masandailaz, namabaliv ata kipo'.
S.TRANSL: 大家排好隊，我們準備買票。
Everyone line up, we are ready to buy tickets.

S.FORM: Maca tantangaus a luqai', maca antanhiku' a ivut, anaka amu saduu.
Maca tantangaos a loqai', maca antanhiko' a ivot, anaka amo sadoo.
S.TRANSL: 前面是鳥類，後面是蛇類，大家自己參觀。
There are birds in the front and snakes in the back.

S.FORM: Nitu Makua, nipin asu sadu luqai' ca.
Nito Makoa, nipin aso sado loqai' ca.
S.TRANSL: It doesn’t matter, then you go and watch the birds.

S.FORM: Maca muqnin ta'a tatnulan a mucuqais ata maipati mu'inun.
Maca moqnin ta'a tatnolan a mocoqais ata maipati mo'inon.
S.TRANSL: 我們一個小時後回來集合。
We’ll be back in an hour.

S.FORM: Madia sala ca luqai' ciin ivut sadu'an zaku.
Madia sala ca loqai' ciin ivot sado'an zako.
S.TRANSL: 我看到了好多蛇，還有好多鳥。
I saw a lot of snakes and a lot of birds.
Hurry up, we have to go.

S.FORM: Muluang tukuc, mamuqu' ca mantac i naak.
Moloang tokoc, mamoqo' ca mantac i naak.
S.TRANSL: Wait for me, my feet are tired.

S.FORM: Madia sala ca bunun haanti tunhapavi.
Madia sala ca bonon haanti tonhapavi.
S.TRANSL: There are a lot of people swimming here.

S.FORM: Kumbu' sala ca danum ha'an aiza, maqtu'in ca ha'anti ata tunhapav.
Kombo' sala ca danom ha'an aiza, maqto'in ca ha'anti ata tonhapav.
S.TRANSL: 那裡水很深，我們在這裡游泳就好。
The water is deep there, so we just swim here.
What kind of car did you take?
How do you go to church?

S.FORM: Ma'ungting ca tama naak laihlih mama' zakun maipata.
Ma'ongting ca tama naak laihlih mama' zakon maipata.

S.TRANSL: How does he usually go to school?
He took the subway to school.

S.FORM: Makua ca qudasnau'az suu maipata mabaliv is sanglav.
Makoa ca qodasnao'az soo maipata mabaliv is sanglav.
S.TRANSL: How does your grandmother go to the grocery store?

S.FORM: Tunlaihlihpukpuk a cia maipata mabaliv is sanglav.
Tonlaihlihpokpok a cia maipata mabaliv is sanglav.
S.TRANSL: She went to the grocery store on a motorcycle.
How are you going to get to Orchid Island?
I want to take a boat to Lanyu.
How did he get to Orchid Island?

S.FORM: Tundaza' a cia kusbabai maipa langi.
Tondaza' a cia kosbabai maipa langi.
S.TRANSL: He took a plane to Orchid Island.

S.FORM: Ma'az tu laihlih tundaza'an a cia maipa takau?
Ma'az to laihlih tondaza'an a cia maipa takao?
S.TRANSL: What bus did he take to Kaohsiung?
He took the THSR to Kaohsiung.
Did he take a train to Taitung?
Yes, he took a train to Taitung.
Did he take a train to Taitung?

S.FORM: Nii, tundaza' a cia kusbabai maipa taitu'.
Nii, tondaza' a cia kosbabai maipa taito'.
S.TRANSL: No, he took a plane to Taitung.

S.FORM: Maiza ca ulu'anlaihlih haan machuan is mangki?
Maiza ca olo'anlaihlih haan machoan is mangki?
S.TRANSL: Is there a bus stop near here?

S.FORM: Maiza, maipa'a tantangaus aiza na saduu asu ulu'anlaihlih.
Maiza, maipa'a tantangaos aiza na sadoo aso olo'anlaihlih.
S.TRANSL: 有，往前走就會看到公車站了。
Yes, if you go straight ahead, you will see the bus stop.

S.FORM: Ica ca mantan machuan a ulu'an laihlihtingki'?
Ica ca mantan machoan a olo'an laihlihtingki'?
S.TRANSL: 離這裡最近的捷運站在哪裡?
Where is the nearest MRT station?

S.FORM: Uka ha'anti ulu'an laihlihtingki', mu'az asu maqtu tunlaihlihkulapha.
Uka ha'anti olo'an laihlihtingki', mo'az aso maqto tonlaihlihkolapha.
S.TRANSL: 這裡沒有捷運站，你只能坐計程車。
There is no MRT station here, you can only take a taxi.

S.FORM: Talpia tatnulan ca daiza'an laihlihqaungu kaca'an sipulan?
Talpia tatnolan ca daiza'an laihlihqaongo kaca'an sipolan?
S.TRANSL: How long does it take to get to the school by bus?

S.FORM: Macan qan hima' kinilutan na kaca'anin sipulan.
Macan qan hima' kinilotan na kaca'anin sipolan.
Piia tatnulan ca daiza'an is laihlihtukhiv kaca'an taiciu'?
Piia tatnolan ca daiza'an is laihlihtokhiv kaca'an taicio'?
S.TRANSL: 搭高鐵要多久時間會到臺中?
How long does it take to get to Taichung by THSR?
I will come to Taichung in an hour.

S.FORM: Talbuntu' ca ma'unting i laihlih munca'an ulaii?
Talbonto' ca ma'onting i laihlih monca'an olaii?
S.TRANSL: Is it a long drive to Ulai?

S.FORM: Piia tatnulan ca daiza'an suu laihlihtingki' munca'an i lumaq naak?
Piia tatnolan ca daiza'an soo laihlihtingki' monca'an i lomaq naak?
S.TRANSL: 你搭捷運來我家要多久?
How long did it take you to come to my house by subway?
Do you know how to ride a bicycle?

S.FORM: Nii'i nitu madia ca qancaipun zaku.
Nii'i nito madia ca qancaipon zako.
S.TRANSL: Don't, I don't know much about it.

S.FORM: Maiza iunlu'an suu ca qani'anin? maqtu azak munsu'uan tantungu?
Maiza ionlo'an soo ca qani'anin? maqto azak monso'oan tantongo?
S.TRANSL: 你下午有空嗎?我想去拜訪你可以嗎?
Are you free this afternoon? I'd like to visit you, is that okay?

S.FORM: Macial, naica'an azak lumaq maltatala su'un.
Macial, naica'an azak lomaq maltatala so'on.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I'll wait for you at home.

S.FORM: Maiza iunlu'an suu ca laqbing? asa caak munsu'uan pacingav is qaibasanan is bunun.
Maiza ionlo'an soo ca laqbing? asa caak monso'oan pacingav is qaibasanan is bonon.
S.TRANSL: 你明天有空嗎?我想請問你關於布農族的傳說故事。
Are you free tomorrow? I'd like to ask you about the legendary story of the [Bunun] people.

S.FORM: Namunludun caak ca laqbing, uka' caak ilumaq.
Namonlodon caak ca laqbing, oka' caak ilomaq.
S.TRANSL: 明天我要去山上，不在家喔。
I'm going to the mountains tomorrow, so I won't be home.

S.FORM: Tinan'a caak tu mantan asu maqaciap palcicia qaibasanan is bunun,asa azak pacingav su'un.
Tinan'a caak to mantan aso maqaciap palcicia qaibasanan is bonon,asa azak pacingav so'on.
S.TRANSL: 我聽說您對布農族的傳統習俗非常了解，想要請教您一下。
I heard that you know a lot about the traditional customs of the Bunun, so I would like to ask you a few questions.

S.FORM: Nitu naun madia ca qancaipun zaku, uutu natanam caak antalam su'un.
Nito naon madia ca qancaipon zako, ooto natanam caak antalam so'on.
S.TRANSL: 我所了解的不多，但是我會盡量回答。
I don't know much about it, but I will try to answer as best I can.

S.FORM: Maqtu caak siza' qaningu? Maupata nanitu inpulungan ca ickuinin.
Maqto caak siza' qaningo? Maopata nanito inpolongan ca ickoinin.
S.TRANSL: 請問我可以錄影嗎?這樣以後比較容易記錄。
Can I record the video? It will be easier to record in the future.

S.FORM: Masivaun qan vauin ca qamisan i naak.
Masivaon qan vaoin ca qamisan i naak.

S.TRANSL: 請問您的太太也是布農族人嗎?

S.FORM: Ma'az ca qancaipun su'u duma' a qalinga.
Ma'az ca qancaipon so'o doma' a qalinga.
Maqanciap azak bazbaz is malasbunu ciin livaqlivaq.
Maqanciap azak bazbaz is malasbono ciin livaqlivaq.
S.TRANSL: 我會說布農語和卑南語。

S.FORM: Mantan azak manahip maqtu pacingav su'un, maqtu asu tanam palcicia itu qanup tu kitsamuan?
Mantan azak manahip maqto pacingav so'on, maqto aso tanam palcicia ito qanop to kitsamoan?
S.TRANSL: 今天很高興能訪問您，請您談一下，有關狩獵的禁忌好嗎?
It's a pleasure to interview you today, can you talk about the taboo of hunting?

S.FORM: Macial, matu talmindung azak a, daqanin caak munludun maqanup.
Macial, mato talmindong azak a, daqanin caak monlodon maqanop.
S.TRANSL: 好的。我年輕的時候很常上山打獵。
Yes. I used to go hunting in the mountains when I was young.

S.FORM: Miqumicang, maca sintaqu' suu haip a, tuza' tu mantan macial.
Miqomicang, maca sintaqo' soo haip a, toza' to mantan macial.
S.TRANSL: 謝謝，您今天所教導的真是太棒了。
Thank you, what you taught me today was really great.

S.FORM: Maca sinbazbaz naak ka mu'amin tukutuku, iciang madadaingaz sinkakiv a qalinga.
Maca sinbazbaz naak ka mo'amin tokotoko, iciang madadaingaz sinkakiv a qalinga.
S.TRANSL: 我所説的都是千真萬確的，祖先所流傳的講述。
All that I say is true, the sayings of my ancestors.

S.FORM: Qanaqtungin ca sinpacingav haip, mantan miqumicang is sintaqu suu.
Qanaqtongin ca sinpacingav haip, mantan miqomicang is sintaqo soo.
S.TRANSL: 今天的訪談就到這邊。非常謝謝您的分享。
That's all for today's interview. Thank you very much for sharing with us.

S.FORM: Namatinghilun azak, maltatala ca ickuinin muqnang tan'a madia' a qaibasanan.
Namatinghilon azak, maltatala ca ickoinin moqnang tan'a madia' a qaibasanan.
S.TRANSL: 我要離開了，期待下次聽到更多的故事。
I'm going to leave now and look forward to hearing more stories next time.
Hello, what are you looking for?
I want to buy a cup.
Hello, what are you looking for?
I want to buy a hat.

S.FORM: Asa caak mabaliv is isququu, maiza balivun haan mu'uan?
Asa caak mabaliv is isqoqoo, maiza balivon haan mo'oan?
S.TRANSL: 我要買杯子，你們有賣嗎?
I want to buy a cup, do you sell them?
Yes, how many do you want to buy?

S.FORM: Maiza ca pinung balivun haan mu'uan?
Maiza ca pinong balivon haan mo'oan?
Uka, nii azam balivan is pinung.
Uka, nii azam balivan is pinong.
S.TRANSL: No, we don't sell betel nut.
How many packs do you want to buy?
I want to buy sweet potatoes.
All the sweet potatoes are sold out.
I want to buy two bottles of oil.
We only have one bottle left.
How many pounds do you want to buy?

S.FORM: piia tingting ca qaipuan balivun su'u?
piia tingting ca qaipoan balivon so'o?
S.TRANSL: How many pounds of eggs do you want to buy?
I want to buy two catties.
I want to buy two green onions.

S.FORM: Mu'hazin taau niluquc i, amini paisuu na!
Mo'hazin taao niloqoc i, amini paisoo na!
S.TRANSL: There are three left, all for you!

S.FORM: Piia cuii ca tatqalup a tilac dii?
Piia coii ca tatqalop a tilac dii?
S.TRANSL: How much is this bag of rice?

S.FORM: Tuskunun a mapusan qan ta'a cuii, maqtu'ing ca mapusanin.
Toskonon a maposan qan ta'a coii, maqto'ing ca maposanin.
Masiva'un qan hima' cuii ca dii.
Masiva'on qan hima' coii ca dii.
Mauqnang caak mabaliv tukuc, pumulun tatsaba' cuii.
Maoqnang caak mabaliv tokoc, pomolon tatsaba' coii.
S.TRANSL: I'll buy some more, and make up 100 yuan.

S.FORM: Hima'saba' dangi'an macan cuii ca tuskunun.
Hima'saba' dangi'an macan coii ca toskonon.
Maqlic sala ki, maqtu naupa ni'aun peqlicun.
Maqlic sala ki, maqto naopa ni'aon peqlicon.
S.TRANSL: 這個太貴了，可以算便宜一點嗎?
It's too expensive, can you make it cheaper?

S.FORM: Nitu maqtu', ni'ing kini maqlic na.
Nito maqto', ni'ing kini maqlic na.
S.TRANSL: 不行，這個已經很便宜了。
No, this is already very cheap.

S.FORM: Mabaliv azak tatqalup is pang dii.
Mabaliv azak tatqalop is pang dii.
S.TRANSL: I want this packet of cookies.

S.FORM: Mati'un cuii ca pang dii, maizang duma' mama'az siza'un su'u?
Mati'on coii ca pang dii, maizang doma' mama'az siza'on so'o?
S.TRANSL: 這餅乾30元，還需要別的東西嗎?
$30 for the cookies, anything else you need?

S.FORM: Maqtu caak isu'uan simul is cuii?
Maqto caak iso'oan simol is coii?
S.TRANSL: Can I borrow money from you?

S.FORM: Maqtu na! pai'un su'u simul ca cuii?
Maqto na! pai'on so'o simol ca coii?
S.TRANSL: Yes! How much do you need?

S.FORM: Minpungul caak madas is cuii, Maqtu caak isu'uan simul is cuii?
Minpongol caak madas is coii, Maqto caak iso'oan simol is coii?
S.TRANSL: 我忘記帶錢了，我可以跟你借錢嗎?
I forgot to bring money, can I borrow money from you?

S.FORM: Nii caak amin madas is cuii ki!
Nii caak amin madas is coii ki!
S.TRANSL: I don't have any money either!

S.FORM: Minpungul caak madas is cuii, Maqtu caak isu'uan simul is cuii?
Minpongol caak madas is coii, Maqto caak iso'oan simol is coii?
S.TRANSL: 我忘記帶錢了，我可以跟你借錢嗎?
I forgot to bring money, can I borrow money from you?

S.FORM: Nii, ni'ang asu macoqais is cuii sinimulan suu tangus a.
Nii, ni'ang aso macoqais is coii sinimolan soo tangos a.
S.TRANSL: 不要，上次借的錢你都還沒還我。
No, you haven't paid me back the money you borrowed last time.

S.FORM: Maqtu caak simul is huluc suu?
Maqto caak simol is holoc soo?
Maqtu caak simul is haqail suu?
Maqto caak simol is haqail soo?
Pasimulin azak i laili'paqaqais suu qa'?
Pasimolin azak i laili'paqaqais soo qa'?
S.TRANSL: 請借給我你的腳踏車好嗎?
Can I borrow your bicycle, please?

S.FORM: Macial, utu coqaisi zaku'an ca laqbingin.
Macial, oto coqaisi zako'an ca laqbingin.
S.TRANSL: Okay, but you have to give it back to me tomorrow.

S.FORM: Qudananin, nii azak madas is talulung, pasimuling is talulung?
Qodananin, nii azak madas is talolong, pasimoling is talolong?
S.TRANSL: 下雨了，我沒有帶傘，借我傘好嗎?
It's raining, I don't have an umbrella, can you lend me one?

S.FORM: Mu'haz ta'a ca talulung naak ,mukun ata talulungan a.
Mo'haz ta'a ca talolong naak ,mokon ata talolongan a.
S.TRANSL: 我只有一把傘，我們一起撐吧!
I only have an umbrella, let's stick together!

S.FORM: Sinimul naak tu tangusang a haqail dii, coqaisun zaku haan su'uan.
Sinimol naak to tangosang a haqail dii, coqaison zako haan so'oan.
S.TRANSL: 這是你上次借我的書，還給你。
This is the book you borrowed from me last time, I give it back to you.

S.FORM: Ma'az tu haqail ca asaunang su'u sadu ka taqu'i caak.
Ma'az to haqail ca asaonang so'o sado ka taqo'i caak.
S.TRANSL: 還想看什麼書都可以跟我說。
You can tell me what else you want to read.

S.FORM: Nalakua azak macoqais is cuii haan su'uan?
Nalakoa azak macoqais is coii haan so'oan?
S.TRANSL: When do I have to pay you back?

S.FORM: Nitu makua, maca maizin is cui suu a, tudiipin pabazbaz.
Nito makoa, maca maizin is coi soo a, todiipin pabazbaz.
S.TRANSL: 沒關係，你有錢的時候再說。
It doesn't matter, you can talk about it when you have money.

S.FORM: Lakua asu macoqais is cuii zakuan?
Lakoa aso macoqais is coii zakoan?
S.TRANSL: When are you going to pay me back?
I'll return it to you tomorrow.

S.FORM: Lakua asu macoqais is haqail zaku'an?
Lakoa aso macoqais is haqail zako'an?
S.TRANSL: When are you going to return my book?

S.FORM: Nitu coqaisunin zaku haan su'uan taqna?
Nito coqaisonin zako haan so'oan taqna?
S.TRANSL: 我昨天不是已經還你了嗎?
Didn't I return it to you yesterday?

S.FORM: Nitu icia Bazai ca ispapatas dii ispasimul su'uan?
Nito icia Bazai ca ispapatas dii ispasimol so'oan?
S.TRANSL: Did Bazai lend you this pen?

S.FORM: Uu, sinimul naak haip han diip.
Uo, sinimol naak haip han diip.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I borrowed it from him today.

S.FORM: Sinimul suu han Bazai ca ispapatas dii?
Sinimol soo han Bazai ca ispapatas dii?
S.TRANSL: Did you borrow this pen from Bazai?

S.FORM: Nii, sinbaliv tina naak ca dii.
Nii, sinbaliv tina naak ca dii.
S.TRANSL: No, this is what mom bought.

S.FORM: Uka'in qacila ki, mucan a Puni simul tukuc is qacila.
Uka'in qacila ki, mocan a Poni simol tokoc is qacila.
S.TRANSL: We are out of salt, let's borrow some from Puni.

S.FORM: Tupa'i ca Puni tu coqaisiving ca cuii zaku'an.
Topa'i ca Poni to coqaisiving ca coii zako'an.
S.TRANSL: Go tell Puni to give me my money back.

S.FORM: Piia cuii ca sinimulan cia haan su'uan?
Piia coii ca sinimolan cia haan so'oan?
S.TRANSL: How much does she owe you?

S.FORM: Namunca'an caak pisanglavan macuaz is sanglav.
Namonca'an caak pisanglavan macoaz is sanglav.
S.TRANSL: I’m going to plant vegetables in the garden.

S.FORM: Masmuting sala ca muut, paqonung zaku, naculan zaku danum ca uninin.
Masmoting sala ca moot, paqonong zako, nacolan zako danom ca oninin.
S.TRANSL: 草太多了，我在砍草，等一下要澆水。
There's too much grass, I'm cutting it, I'll have to water it later.

S.FORM: Kadangazing siza' is kavng ciin tanga maipa dii qa?
Kadangazing siza' is kavng ciin tanga maipa dii qa?
S.TRANSL: 幫我把鐮刀和鋤頭拿來好嗎?
Will you get my scythes and hoes, please?
Put it next to the plow rake.
Did you turn over the soil?

S.FORM: Laupang cinoqaz naak, namacuaz ca uninin.
Laopang cinoqaz naak, namacoaz ca oninin.
S.TRANSL: 我剛翻過土，等等要播種。
I just turned over the soil, and so on to sow seeds.

S.FORM: Maqtu'in tabalan ca sincuaz is suu a sanglav.
Maqto'in tabalan ca sincoaz is soo a sanglav.
S.TRANSL: 你種的菜可以收成了嗎?
Are your vegetables ready to be harvested?

S.FORM: Maqtu'in ca sanglavqatumu' tabalan, ni'ang ca sanglavlandeq aiza maqtu siza'un.
Maqto'in ca sanglavqatomo' tabalan, ni'ang ca sanglavlandeq aiza maqto siza'on.
S.TRANSL: 這裡的高麗菜可以收成了，那裡的昭和草就還不能收成。
The cabbage here is ready to be harvested, but the Showa grass there is not yet ready to be harvested.

S.FORM: Paqa, mantan madiia ca sinkai suu a hutani.
Paqa, mantan madiia ca sinkai soo a hotani.
S.TRANSL: 哇!你挖了這麼多的地瓜。
(sighs) Wow! You dug up so many gourds.
Will you help me with the barn?
We're releasing fishing nets to catch fish.

S.FORM: Madiia'in ca sinamu a kaan ca'an kumbu is kalala'.
Madiia'in ca sinamo a kaan ca'an kombo is kalala'.
S.TRANSL: 魚簍裡已經抓了很多魚。
The fish basket has been full of fish.

S.FORM: Pikau'un mu'u madamu ca kaan i?
Pikao'on mo'o madamo ca kaan i?
S.TRANSL: How do you usually catch fish?

S.FORM: Manumu' caak mukucia it panaqkaan manaq.
Manomo' caak mokocia it panaqkaan manaq.
S.TRANSL: I shoot fish with a spear.

S.FORM: Maqaciap asu mukucia it lapu' maqanup?
Maqaciap aso mokocia it lapo' maqanop?
S.TRANSL: Do you know how to hunt with a bow and arrow?

S.FORM: Manumu' caak makucia it haqu, uma'anan amin madas is bucul ciin acu' mahavun.
Manomo' caak makocia it haqo, oma'anan amin madas is bocol ciin aco' mahavon.
S.TRANSL: 我通常都是用陷阱抓獵物，偶爾也會拿槍帶狗狩獵。
I usually catch my prey with a trap, but occasionally I hunt with a gun and a dog.

S.FORM: Linaqaiban is vanis ca daan dii.
Linaqaiban is vanis ca daan dii.
S.TRANSL: This is the road the boar took.

S.FORM: Dapan is vanis ca dii, anaqat laqaqaiban is vanis ca daan dii.
Dapan is vanis ca dii, anaqat laqaqaiban is vanis ca daan dii.
S.TRANSL: 這是山豬的腳印，所以這是山豬所走的路。
These are the footprints of the boar, so this is the path the boar took.

S.FORM: Mahaiva qan maipata sadu' ki haqu nita, maupa is musbacin ca haqu.
Mahaiva qan maipata sado' ki haqo nita, maopa is mosbacin ca haqo.
S.TRANSL: 快去看我們的陷阱，好像抓到獵物了。
Go and see our trap, for it seems that we have caught our prey.

S.FORM: Maupa is sakunin is acu, mahaiva qan ata maipata kantulun.
Maopa is sakonin is aco, mahaiva qan ata maipata kantolon.
S.TRANSL: 狗好像聞到味道了。我們快跟過去。
The dog seems to have smelled it. Let's follow them.

S.FORM: Ma'az tu mama'az ca tata'iun su'u ki?
Ma'az to mama'az ca tata'ion so'o ki?
S.TRANSL: 你正在製作的是什麼東西?

S.FORM: Qatu ca dii, isdamu kis qamutic.
Qato ca dii, isdamo kis qamotic.
S.TRANSL: 這是石壓式陷阱，用來抓老鼠的。
This is a stone trap, used to catch rats.

S.FORM: Ma'az ca picanun su'u aiza ki?
Ma'az ca picanon so'o aiza ki?
S.TRANSL: 你放在那裡的是什麼東西?
What is that thing you put there?

S.FORM: Haqu ca kunan, naisdamu zami kis cakut.
Haqo ca konan, naisdamo zami kis cakot.
S.TRANSL: 那是套腳式繩索陷阱，我們用它來抓山羌。
It was a leg-rigged rope trap, and we used it to catch Shankiang.

S.FORM: Miqumicang sinaivang maimadaingaz tu bahi', madiia ca qainupan haip.
Miqomicang sinaivang maimadaingaz to bahi', madiia ca qainopan haip.
S.TRANSL: 感謝祖靈賜福，今天我們有很多獵物收獲。
Thanks to the blessing of our ancestors, we had a great harvest today.

S.FORM: Uu na, nadasun ita munacang ispaqusil.
Uo na, nadason ita monacang ispaqosil.
S.TRANSL: 是啊!我們帶回部落好好分享吧!
Yeah! Let's take it back to the tribe and share it!

S.FORM: Nataqu'an zaku amu haip tu tukau'un malasbunun ca tusmumut.
Nataqo'an zako amo haip to tokao'on malasbonon ca tosmomot.
S.TRANSL: 今天我要教大家動物的布農語怎麼說。
I will teach everyone all kinds of animals in Bunun language today.

S.FORM: Nataqu'an zaku amu haip tu tukau'un malasbunun ca mutmuut.
Nataqo'an zako amo haip to tokao'on malasbonon ca motmoot.
S.TRANSL: 今天我要教大家植物的布農語怎麼說。

S.FORM: Nataqu'an zaku amu haip tu tukau'un malasbunun ca kukutdaqun.
Nataqo'an zako amo haip to tokao'on malasbonon ca kokotdaqon.
S.TRANSL: 今天我要教大家水果的布農語怎麼說。
I will teach everyone all kinds of fruits in Bunun language today.

S.FORM: Huluc it Balan ca aiza ki?
Holoc it Balan ca aiza ki?
Nii, iciat Kuut ca pakanata'un i.
Nii, iciat Koot ca pakanata'on i.
Tataqu', minpungul azak madas i haqail.
Tataqo', minpongol azak madas i haqail.
S.TRANSL: Teacher, I didn’t bring my textbook.
Share the book with your classmate next to you.

S.FORM: Pasimulun zaku asu ki isqaqaisqais i naak.
Pasimolon zako aso ki isqaqaisqais i naak.
S.TRANSL: I will lend you my eraser.

S.FORM: Kanaqtungin ca pisqancaipan haip, saduduu'a han daan.
Kanaqtongin ca pisqancaipan haip, sadodoo'a han daan.
S.TRANSL: 我們要下課了，回家路上要小心!
It is the end of the class, be careful on your way home.

S.FORM: Kanaqtungin ca pisqancaipan haip, miqumicang mu'un.
Kanaqtongin ca pisqancaipan haip, miqomicang mo'on.
S.TRANSL: 我們要下課了，大家再見。
The class is over, goodbye everyone.

S.FORM: Miqumicang, Bazai ca ngaan i naak.
Miqomicang, Bazai ca ngaan i naak.
S.TRANSL: Hello everyone, my name is Abang.

S.FORM: Miqumicang, Balan ca ngaan i naak.
Miqomicang, Balan ca ngaan i naak.
S.TRANSL: Hello everyone, my name is Tuwak.

S.FORM: Miqumicang, Tudai ca ngaan i naak.
Miqomicang, Todai ca ngaan i naak.

S.TRANSL: I am Isin’s sister. My name is Aing.

S.FORM: Ulang a kunan, tataqu ki naak.
Ulang a konan, tataqo ki naak.
Cima ca ngaan i tuqasnau'az i suu?
Cima ca ngaan i toqasnao'az i soo?
S.TRANSL: What is your elder sister’s name?

S.FORM: Abuc ca ngaan i tuqasnau'az i naak.
Aboc ca ngaan i toqasnao'az i naak.
S.TRANSL: My elder sister’s name is Abas.

Would you mind if I do the video recording?

S.FORM: Qamang caak didikla sadu'an, amin tu ni'ang qaisvazun ca patilacan, bazin ni'ang.
Qamang caak didikla sado'an, amin to ni'ang qaisvazon ca patilacan, bazin ni'ang.
S.TRANSL: 我不好看，倉庫也沒整理，不要啦。
No, I am plain and the warehouse hasn’t been tidied up yet.
Then I will just take photos.
Thank you for accepting the interview.

S.FORM: Nikua, ma'az ca asaun su'u macingav?
Nikoa, ma'az ca asaon so'o macingav?
S.TRANSL: You are welcome. What would you like to know?

S.FORM: Macingav tu ma'az ca kukuzaun su'u tu talminduuvang asu?
Macingav to ma'az ca kokozaon so'o to talmindoovang aso?
S.TRANSL: 請問您年輕時是做什麼的?
What do you do when you are young?

S.FORM: Sabinaz caak tu qabasan, utu mulukin caak haipi.
Sabinaz caak to qabasan, oto molokin caak haipi.
S.TRANSL: 我以前是警察，但我現在退休了。
I was a police officer but I am retired now.
Then, are you working at the moment?

S.FORM: Macingav tu ihaan acang amin miqumic ca uva'az i suu?
Macingav to ihaan acang amin miqomic ca ova'az i soo?
S.TRANSL: 請問您的孩子也住在部落嗎?
Do your kids live in the tribe too?

S.FORM: Nii, ihaan bukzav ca uva'az naak miqumic.
Nii, ihaan bokzav ca ova'az naak miqomic.
S.TRANSL: 不，我的孩子在都市居住。
No, my kids are all living in the city.
Then, do you live by yourself?

S.FORM: Maizang sinaipuk naak acu' cin luqai, tatlumaqan naak amin ca naingkun.
Maizang sinaipok naak aco' cin loqai, tatlomaqan naak amin ca naingkon.
S.TRANSL: 我還有養一隻狗和一隻鳥，他們也是我的家人。
I also keep a dog and a bird. They are my family.

S.FORM: Maiza amin ngaung ca saipukun zaku, maiza ca sinaipuk nanii tu maqanciap tu makama'az.
Maiza amin ngaong ca saipokon zako, maiza ca sinaipok nanii to maqanciap to makama'az.
S.TRANSL: 我也有養一隻貓，有動物陪伴不會無聊。
I have a cat too. I won’t get bored with the company of my pet.

S.FORM: Pacingavang su'un palcicia itu qanup tu samu.
Pacingavang so'on palcicia ito qanop to samo.
S.TRANSL: 我想請問你關於打獵的禁忌。
I would like to ask you about the taboos of hunting.

S.FORM: Nii tu madia ca kitqancaipan naak, utu nataqu'an zaku asu ca qancaipun zaku.
Nii to madia ca kitqancaipan naak, oto nataqo'an zako aso ca qancaipon zako.
S.TRANSL: 我知道的不多，但我能回答的都會回答你。
I don’t know much about that, but I will tell you everything I know.

S.FORM: Maiza itu samu ca isqaqanup muu'i?
Maiza ito samo ca isqaqanop moo'i?
S.TRANSL: 你們打獵的武器有什麼禁忌嗎?
Do you have any taboos about hunting weapons?

S.FORM: Nii tu maqtu patidu'an binanau'az ca isqaqanup naam.
Nii to maqto patido'an binanao'az ca isqaqanop naam.
S.TRANSL: 我們打獵的武器不可以讓女生碰到。
Our hunting weapons are untouchable to women.
那女人可以一起去打獵嗎?
Then, can women go hunting together?

S.FORM: Nii, nii ca binanau'az maqtu qanup.
Nii, nii ca binanao'az maqto qanop.
S.TRANSL: 不行，女人也不可以打獵。
No, women cannot go hunting either.

S.FORM: Bazai, uka'in davuctilac han lumaq qi, nipin asu mabaliv i davuctilac.
Bazai, oka'in davoctilac han lomaq qi, nipin aso mabaliv i davoctilac.
S.TRANSL: Bazai，家裡沒有米酒了，你去買米酒。
Kacaw, our home is out of rice wine, please go and buy some.

S.FORM: Maizang ta'a paan han pitdai'an a. bazin nitu mabaliv pana!
Maizang ta'a paan han pitdai'an a. bazin nito mabaliv pana!
S.TRANSL: 廚房裡還有一瓶，不用買吧!
There is still one bottle left in the kitchen, so there is no need to buy one!

S.FORM: Patvai ca ta'a paan, nipin mauqnang mabaliv i dusa paan.
Patvai ca ta'a paan, nipin maoqnang mabaliv i dosa paan.
S.TRANSL: 一瓶不夠，再去買兩瓶回來。
One bottle is not enough for me, go and buy two more back.

S.FORM: Mabaliv azak i davuctilac, maiza' imuu?
Mabaliv azak i davoctilac, maiza' imoo?
S.TRANSL: 我要買米酒，你們有賣嗎?
I am looking for rice wine. Do you have any rice wine?

S.FORM: Haiza na, pia ca nabalivun su'u?
Haiza na, pia ca nabalivon so'o?
S.TRANSL: Yes! How many bottles do you need?

S.FORM: Mabaliv azak dusa' paan, mauqnang mabaliv i tatqalup tilac.
Mabaliv azak dosa' paan, maoqnang mabaliv i tatqalop tilac.
S.TRANSL: 我要買兩瓶，還要買一包米。
I want two bottles and a pack of rice.

S.FORM: Haan dii ca tilac, ma'azing ca duma siza'un suu.
Haan dii ca tilac, ma'azing ca doma siza'on soo.
S.TRANSL: 米在這裡，你還需要什麼嗎?
Here is the rice, what else do you need?

S.FORM: Namauqnang caak mabaliv i qaipuan, maiza' imuu?
Namaoqnang caak mabaliv i qaipoan, maiza' imoo?
S.TRANSL: I want some eggs too, do you have some?

S.FORM: Aminunin bunun mabaliv ca qaipuan i naam.
Aminonin bonon mabaliv ca qaipoan i naam.

S.TRANSL: I want to buy some clothes.
What kind of clothes do you like?

S.FORM: Mabaliva ki mapuchu pakiman tu huluc.
Mabaliva ki mapocho pakiman to holoc.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy the clothes with short sleeves.
We have white and blue ones too.

S.FORM: Aiving caak ta'a masanglav tu huluc.
Aiving caak ta'a masanglav to holoc.
S.TRANSL: 請給我一件藍色的衣服。
Please give me the clothes in blue.

S.FORM: Bazai, maqica asu sangan a? pisqacibang asu sangan?
Bazai, maqica aso sangan a? pisqacibang aso sangan?
S.TRANSL: Bazai你剛剛去哪裡了?你去運動嗎?
kacaw, where have you been just now? Did you go exercising?

S.FORM: Nii, mindangaz caak i qudasnau'az naak balivan is sanglav.
Nii, mindangaz caak i qodasnao'az naak balivan is sanglav.
S.TRANSL: No, I went grocery shopping for my grandma.

S.FORM: Maupata dau, maiza inulu'an suu ca sanavanin? maqtu ata muskun ma'un qaising.
Maopata dao, maiza inolo'an soo ca sanavanin? maqto ata moskon ma'on qaising.
S.TRANSL: 這樣啊，你晚上有沒有空?要不要和我一起吃飯。
No wonder! Are you available at night? Would you like to have a meal with me?

S.FORM: Nitu maqtu, namudan caak mabaliv i huluc.
Nito maqto, namodan caak mabaliv i holoc.
S.TRANSL: No, I want to buy some clothes.
Then, I will go with you.

S.FORM: Miqumicng, piia cui ca tatnilauqut a sanglav dii?
Miqomicng, piia coi ca tatnilaoqot a sanglav dii?
S.TRANSL: 你好，請問這把菜多少錢?
Hello, how much is this bunch of vegetables?

S.FORM: Mapusan cui ca tatnilauqut a sanglav dii.
Maposan coi ca tatnilaoqot a sanglav dii.
S.TRANSL: The vegetables are $20 for a bunch.
How much are these sweet potatoes?

S.FORM: Mati'un cui ca tattingting a hutan dii.
Mati'on coi ca tattingting a hotan dii.
S.TRANSL: Sweet potatoes are thirty dollars for a pound.

S.FORM: Aiving caak i dusa nilauqut a sanglav cin tattingting a hutan.
Aiving caak i dosa nilaoqot a sanglav cin tattingting a hotan.
S.TRANSL: 請給我兩把菜和一斤地瓜。

S.FORM: Batu, minpungul caak madas i ispapatas, maqtu asu pasimul zakun?
Bato, minpongol caak madas i ispapatas, maqto aso pasimol zakon?
S.TRANSL: Batu，我忘了帶筆，你可以借我嗎?
,kacaw I forgot to bring my pen. Can you lend me one?

S.FORM: Uka' inak amin, icia ca dii ki Kaut.
Uka' inak amin, icia ca dii ki Kaot.
S.TRANSL: I don’t have one either. This is Kaut’s.

S.FORM: Maqtu naupa mukhivang pasimul zakun, namahiav caak macauqais suan.
Maqto naopa mokhivang pasimol zakon, namahiav caak macaoqais soan.
S.TRANSL: 那可以借我一下子嗎?我很快就還你。
Can you lend me the pen for a second? I will return to you immediately.

S.FORM: Miqumicang, kadangazing amin miqumicang i Kaut.
Miqomicang, kadangazing amin miqomicang i Kaot.
S.TRANSL: Thank you and thank Panay for me.

S.FORM: Macauqais azak i dusa' tu paitasan dii.
Macaoqais azak i dosa' to paitasan dii.
S.TRANSL: I want to return these two books.

S.FORM: Uu, ma'azing ca asaun su'u duma?
Uo, ma'azing ca asaon so'o doma?
S.TRANSL: No problem and what else do you need?

S.FORM: mauqnang caak simul i taau tu paitasan.
maoqnang caak simol i taao to paitasan.
S.TRANSL: I would like to borrow these three books.

S.FORM: Uu na, aka'a tu minpungul macauqais ca taaukinqanin.
Uo na, aka'a to minpongol macaoqais ca taaokinqanin.
S.TRANSL: 好了。記得三天後要拿來還。
Sure and remember to return them after three days.

S.FORM: Ni'ang asu macauqais zakun isqaqaisqais naak.
Ni'ang aso macaoqais zakon isqaqaisqais naak.
S.TRANSL: You haven’t returned me the eraser.

S.FORM: Makua cuna munghav ca isqaqaisqais naak.
Makoa cona monghav ca isqaqaisqais naak.
S.TRANSL: 那我的橡皮擦怎麼不見了。
Then, why is my eraser missing?
Did you lend it to kacaw?

S.FORM: Nii caak maqanciap, tanamun zaku macingav a cia ti.
Nii caak maqanciap, tanamon zako macingav a cia ti.
S.TRANSL: I don’t know. I will go and ask her.

S.FORM: Tangusunang zaku asu pasimul i isqaqaisqais naak.
Tangosonang zako aso pasimol i isqaqaisqais naak.
S.TRANSL: I will lend you my eraser first.

S.FORM: Kaut, icia Batu sinpasimul i suu ca paknata'un i?
Kaot, icia Bato sinpasimol i soo ca paknata'on i?
S.TRANSL: panay, did kacaw lend you this coat?

S.FORM: Nii, sinbaliv i tina naak ca kini.
Nii, sinbaliv i tina naak ca kini.
S.TRANSL: 不是，這是我媽媽買給我的
No, my mom bought it for me.

S.FORM: Maszang icia kit Batu ca paknata'un suu.
Maszang icia kit Bato ca paknata'on soo.
S.TRANSL: kacaw’s coat is the same as yours.

S.FORM: Niitu mazang ca patas naak, madaqdung ca icia.
Niito mazang ca patas naak, madaqdong ca icia.
S.TRANSL: 他的外套是黑色的，我們的顏色不一樣。
His coat is black, so our colors are different.

S.FORM: Kaut, misimul asu haan Batu ki cui?
Kaot, misimol aso haan Bato ki coi?
S.TRANSL: panay, did you borrow money from kacaw?

S.FORM: Uu, ala cauqaisun zaku haip haan cian a, minpungul caak madas i cui.
Uo, ala caoqaison zako haip haan cian a, minpongol caak madas i coi.
S.TRANSL: 有，我本來今天要還他，我忘記帶錢了。
Yes, I was supposed to return to him today, but I forgot to bring the money.
Then, when will you return the money?
I will return to him tomorrow.

S.FORM: Uu, nakadangdazan zaku asu taqu kit Batu.
Uo, nakadangdazan zako aso taqo kit Bato.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I will tell kacaw for you.

S.FORM: Maca madamu ki qamutic asa makucia ki qatu, maca madamu ki tikulac asa makucia ki haqu, maupata namamantuk.
Maca madamo ki qamotic asa makocia ki qato, maca madamo ki tikolac asa makocia ki haqo, maopata namamantok.
S.TRANSL: 老鼠應該要⽤⽯壓式陷阱抓，⽵雞應該要⽤套頸式陷阱抓，這樣才對。
It is correct to catch mice through rangay and catch bamboo partridges through qjiulang.

S.FORM: Maupata qana, muliva qana caak, anaqa niitu udamuan.
Maopata qana, moliva qana caak, anaqa niito odamoan.
S.TRANSL: 原來是這樣，我都搞錯了！難怪我都抓不到。
No wonder! I am mistaken and that’s why I cannot catch any of them.

S.FORM: Nataquan zaku asu mata'i maidusa' a haqu mangki.
Nataqoan zako aso mata'i maidosa' a haqo mangki.
S.TRANSL: 那我再教你怎麼製作這兩種陷阱。
Then I will teach you how to set up these two traps.

S.FORM: Uu, mantan macial, namaqtu'in caak udamuan i tusmumut.
Uo, mantan macial, namaqto'in caak odamoan i tosmomot.
S.TRANSL: 好啊！太棒了！這樣我以後就會抓到獵物了。
Great! I will be able to catch the prey in the future.

S.FORM: Masmutin ca quma, maipa'a patilacan siza' is kavung, namunquma ata.
Masmotin ca qoma, maipa'a patilacan siza' is kavong, namonqoma ata.
S.TRANSL: 田裡的草太長了，你去倉庫拿鐮刀，我們去田裡。
The grass in the fields is too tall. Go to the warehouse to take the sickle and let’s go to the fields.

S.FORM: Haan ngalan is palangan, saduananin ca munkumbu asu ki patilacan.
Haan ngalan is palangan, sadoananin ca monkombo aso ki patilacan.
S.TRANSL: 在簍子的旁邊，你進去倉庫就會看到了。
It is next to the round basket. You will see it when you enter the warehouse.

S.FORM: Malulua ca siza namilulu, manucqaic sala ca kavung.
Maloloa ca siza namilolo, manocqaic sala ca kavong.
S.TRANSL: 小心拿，不要受傷。鐮刀很利。
Be careful and don’t get hurt. The sickle is very sharp.

S.FORM: Aka'a tu kanpanan ca haqu naak.
Aka'a to kanpanan ca haqo naak.
Haan nastu is lukic aiza ca haqu naak.
Haan nasto is lokic aiza ca haqo naak.
S.TRANSL: 我的陷阱在那棵樹的下面。
My trap is under that tree.

S.FORM: Maiza sinpacqal naak haan dii, anaqat malulu azak tu ica ca haqu naak.
Maiza sinpacqal naak haan dii, anaqat malolo azak to ica ca haqo naak.
S.TRANSL: 我在這邊有做記號，我知道我的陷阱在哪裡。
I make a mark here, so I know where my trap is.

S.FORM: Maca dii ka kaan kalala', pihanun zami vaqlac isdamu ki kaan.
Maca dii ka kaan kalala', pihanon zami vaqlac isdamo ki kaan.
S.TRANSL: 這是魚筌，我們放在溪邊捕魚。
This is a fish trap which we put beside the river for fishing.

S.FORM: Uka inam kaan kalala', makucia cam i busvit maniza is kaan.
Uka inam kaan kalala', makocia cam i bosvit maniza is kaan.
S.TRANSL: 我們那邊沒有魚筌，我們都用釣竿抓魚。
We don’t have any fish traps there, so we catch fish with a fishing rod.

S.FORM: Ni'ang caak cinukau is busvit, maqtu asu taqu zakun ca muqnin?
Ni'ang caak cinokao is bosvit, maqto aso taqo zakon ca moqnin?
S.TRANSL: 我沒有用過釣竿，你下次教我好嗎?
I have never used a fishing rod before, would you mind teaching me next time?

S.FORM: Macial na! muskun ata maniza is kaan ca mauqnin.
Macial na! moskon ata maniza is kaan ca maoqnin.
S.TRANSL: 好啊!我們下次一起去釣魚。
Sure! Let’s go fishing together next time.

S.FORM: Nataqu'an zaku asu mata'i ki kaan kalala' ca maqnin.
Nataqo'an zako aso mata'i ki kaan kalala' ca maqnin.
S.TRANSL: I will teach you how to make a fish trap next time.

S.FORM: Vindauqvindauqin ca busvit suu i, sadu'i ti haizin kaan. mahaiva qan simutmut.
Vindaoqvindaoqin ca bosvit soo i, sado'i ti haizin kaan. mahaiva qan simotmot.
S.TRANSL: 你的釣竿動了，是不是有魚上鉤了!你快拉起來。
Your fishing rod is moving. Isn’t the fish on the hook? Pull it up!

S.FORM: Mulu'ang, vivindauq ca qatu, haanti caak sibutbut i busvit, maipa'a asu maka' kadangaz zakun siza' is ami'.
Molo'ang, vivindaoq ca qato, haanti caak sibotbot i bosvit, maipa'a aso maka' kadangaz zakon siza' is ami'.
S.TRANSL: 等等，船太晃了。我在這邊拉釣竿，你去那邊幫我拿網子來。
Wait, the ship is rolling heavily. I am here to pull the fishing rod and you should go there to grab me the net.

S.FORM: Pepai'i dii ca kaan i, kadangazun zaku asu sibutbut.
Pepai'i dii ca kaan i, kadangazon zako aso sibotbot.
S.TRANSL: 你把魚拉到我這邊。我幫妳拉起來。
Pull the fish to my side and I will help you pull it up.

S.FORM: Mantan manahip, kabahi ata haip, maqmuzin ca kalala'.
Mantan manahip, kabahi ata haip, maqmozin ca kalala'.
S.TRANSL: 太好了!今天大豐收，魚簍都裝滿了。
Great! It is a bumper crop today with full fish baskets.

S.FORM: Mahiav ata mucuqais namuskun ata paqusil.
Mahiav ata mocoqais namoskon ata paqosil.
S.TRANSL: 我們快回去和大家分享。
Let’s go back immediately and share it with everyone.

S.FORM: Aka'avin tu kavivila, mucuqaisa ha'an pangka'ulungqu' an su'u.
Aka'avin to kavivila, mocoqaisa ha'an pangka'olongqo' an so'o.
S.TRANSL: 不要再玩了，快坐在座位上。
Stop playing and quickly sit in your seat.

S.FORM: Malkahima' ca haip, namul'uu ca laqbing, muskun ata mudan kavila ti.
Malkahima' ca haip, namol'oo ca laqbing, moskon ata modan kavila ti.
S.TRANSL: 今天星期五，明天放假，一起出去玩吧。
It’s Friday today, we have a day off tomorrow. Let’s go out and play together!

S.FORM: Macial na, muskun ata munvaqlac ti.
Macial na, moskon ata monvaqlac ti.
S.TRANSL: Great! Let’s go to the riverside.
What day will it be tomorrow?

S.FORM: Malkati'un ca laqbing, muskun ata laqbing qani'an kavila' mali' qa.
Malkati'on ca laqbing, moskon ata laqbing qani'an kavila' mali' qa.
S.TRANSL: 明天星期三，我們明天下午去玩球吧。
Tomorrow will be Wednesday. Let’s go play ball tomorrow afternoon!
What will you be doing tomorrow morning?

S.FORM: Ulu'an ca laqbing, namuskun azak tina nak munsumsuman.
Ulo'an ca laqbing, namoskon azak tina nak monsomsoman.
S.TRANSL: 明天是星期日，我要和媽媽去教會。
Tomorrow will be Sunday, I will be going to church with my mom.

S.FORM: Asa cak mutaq, namudan cak kilim i 'utaki'an.
Asa cak motaq, namodan cak kilim i 'otaki'an.
S.TRANSL: I feel like vomiting. I need to go to the restroom.

S.FORM: Tataqu, macakbit ca tian nak, asa kilim 'utaki'an.
Tataqo, macakbit ca tian nak, asa kilim 'otaki'an.
S.TRANSL: 老師，我肚子痛，要去廁所。
Teacher, I have a stomachache. I need to go to the restroom.
May I go wash my hands?
It’s almost time for class to end. Wait a little longer.

S.FORM: Tataqu, macakbit sala ca bungu, namuluu cak ca qani'anin.
Tataqo, macakbit sala ca bongo, namoloo cak ca qani'anin.
S.TRANSL: 老師，我頭好痛，下午要請假。
It’s almost time for class to end. Wait a little longer.
Okay, take care and go home.

S.FORM: Tataqu, namuluu cak ca muqnin malkac'an. maupa'i nasaduu cak ising.
Tataqo, namoloo cak ca moqnin malkac'an. maopa'i nasadoo cak ising.
S.TRANSL: 老師我下禮拜一要請假，我要去看醫生。
Teacher, I need to take a sick leave next Monday. I have to see a doctor.

S.FORM: Han cia 'utaki'an, macakbit dau ca tian cia.
Han cia 'otaki'an, macakbit dao ca tian cia.
S.TRANSL: She has a stomachache. She’s in the restroom.

S.FORM: Tataqu, macakbit ca qungqungan it Malan, muluu cia haip
Tataqo, macakbit ca qongqongan it Malan, moloo cia haip
S.TRANSL: Teacher, Malan has a sore throat. She took a sick leave today.

S.FORM: Makua cuna uka' at Kaut maipati?
Makoa cona oka' at Kaot maipati?
Bazai Tamalasan cak, macanin qamisan nak haip.
Bazai Tamalasan cak, macanin qamisan nak haip.
S.TRANSL: My name is Bazai Tamalasan, and I’m 10 years old.
你的家人都是原住民嗎?
Are all your family members indigenous?

S.FORM: Uu, mu'amin ca tatlumaq nam bunun cuku.
Uo, mo'amin ca tatlomaq nam bonon coko.
S.TRANSL: 是的，我們全家都是布農族人。
Yes, my whole family is Bunun.
你的家人都是原住民嗎?
Are all your family members indigenous?

S.FORM: Nii, Bunun cuku' at Tama nak, buut ca tina nak.
Nii, Bonon coko' at Tama nak, boot ca tina nak.
S.TRANSL: 不是，我的爸爸是布農族，我的媽媽是漢人。
No, my father is Bunun, and my mother is Han Taiwanese.

S.FORM: Tama suu ca mazka'i? piin qamisan cia?
Tama soo ca mazka'i? piin qamisan cia?
S.TRANSL: 那位是你爸爸嗎? 他幾歲了?
Is that your father? How old is he?

S.FORM: Tama suu ca mazka'i? piin qamisan cia?
Tama soo ca mazka'i? piin qamisan cia?
S.TRANSL: 那位是你爸爸嗎? 他幾歲了?
Is that your father? How old is he?

S.FORM: Nii, madadaingaz i acang nam at kunan, mavau'unin ca qamisan cia.
Nii, madadaingaz i acang nam at konan, mavao'onin ca qamisan cia.
S.TRANSL: 不是，他是我們部落的耆老，他80歲了。
No, he is an elder of our tribe. He is 80 years old.

S.FORM: Mac'an qan vau'in ca qamisan it tuqasnanaz nak.
Mac'an qan vao'in ca qamisan it toqasnanaz nak.
Madaing sala ca qamisan it tuqasnanaz maka' su'u?
Madaing sala ca qamisan it toqasnanaz maka' so'o?
S.TRANSL: 你哥哥年紀比你大很多嗎?
Is your brother much older than you?

S.FORM: Tatsaba anian qan masipatun taknul ca kidaqvasan nak.
Tatsaba anian qan masipaton taknol ca kidaqvasan nak.
Talmuntukin nitu pasadu, mindaqvasin asu ki qa?
Talmontokin nito pasado, mindaqvasin aso ki qa?
S.TRANSL: 好久不見，你是不是長高了?
I haven’t seen you in a while. Have you grown taller?

S.FORM: Uu, tatsaba anian qan mati'unin taknul ca kidaqvasan nak.
Uo, tatsaba anian qan mati'onin taknol ca kidaqvasan nak.
Namaipa caak kukuzaun tataqu kilim i tataqu.
Namaipa caak kokozaon tataqo kilim i tataqo.
S.TRANSL: I’m going to the office to see the teacher.
He’s going to throw away the trash.

S.FORM: Ihan cia ki tunhapavan, napaluntan at cia unin tunhahapav.
Ihan cia ki tonhapavan, napalontan at cia onin tonhahapav.
S.TRANSL: 他在游泳池，他等一下要比賽游泳。
He’s at the swimming pool. He’s going to compete in a swimming competition later.

S.FORM: Icaqat Kaut a? napaluntan a cia unin i malilia qai.
Icaqat Kaot a? napalontan a cia onin i malilia qai.
S.TRANSL: Kaut在哪裡?她等一下要比賽跑步。
Where is Kaut? She’s going to compete in a running competition later.

S.FORM: Iha'an cia u'inunan i masisipul a, luklacun zaku ti.
Iha'an cia o'inonan i masisipol a, loklacon zako ti.
S.TRANSL: She’s in the auditorium. I’ll go call her.
Let’s go to the playground together.

S.FORM: Mungausang azak mabaliv i paitututusvali, kilimun zaku asu ca unin.
Mongaosang azak mabaliv i paitototosvali, kilimon zako aso ca onin.
S.TRANSL: 我先去買午餐，等一下去找你。
I’ll go buy lunch first, and then I’ll meet you later.

S.FORM: Muskun ata ancaqan i mauqus qa!
Moskon ata ancaqan i maoqos qa!
S.TRANSL: Let’s carry the lunch boxes together!

S.FORM: Kilimang numa', maupa'i nakilim ca ki tataqu.
Kilimang noma', maopa'i nakilim ca ki tataqo.
S.TRANSL: 你找別人，我要去找老師。
You find someone else, I’m going to find the teacher.

S.FORM: Paluntan at Batu kit matuqtuqmali' haip?
Palontan at Bato kit matoqtoqmali' haip?
S.TRANSL: Is Batu competing in croquet today?

S.FORM: Nii, napaluntan a cia ki tidangkulan.
Nii, napalontan a cia ki tidangkolan.
S.TRANSL: No, he’s competing in high jump.

S.FORM: Naminhamu asu ki paluntan ca tudiipin han paluntanan?
Naminhamo aso ki palontan ca todiipin han palontanan?
S.TRANSL: 運動會那天你會上場比賽嗎?
Will you compete in the sports day?

S.FORM: Naminhamu asu ki paluntan ca tudiipin han paluntanan?
Naminhamo aso ki palontan ca todiipin han palontanan?
S.TRANSL: 運動會那天你會上場比賽嗎?
Will you compete in the sports day?

S.FORM: Namakama'az ata ca tudiipin han paluntanan?
Namakama'az ata ca todiipin han palontanan?
S.TRANSL: 我們運動會那天要做甚麼?
What will we do in the sports day?
We will compete in tug of war.
我們運動會要賣食物嗎?
Will we sell food at the sports day?

S.FORM: Lavai qana asu dia, mamananu' qana!
Lavai qana aso dia, mamanano' qana!
S.TRANSL: 你獲得了第一名耶，真是厲害！
Congratulations on getting first place! You’re amazing!

S.FORM: Uu haiza, han cia sapalan masabaq.
Uo haiza, han cia sapalan masabaq.
S.TRANSL: Yes, she’s sleeping in her room.

S.FORM: Uka', laupang a cia mudata', nasanavanin cia mucuqais.
Uka', laopang a cia modata', nasanavanin cia mocoqais.
S.TRANSL: 不在，她剛出去了，要晚上才回家。
No, she’s not. She just went out and will be back in the evening.

S.FORM: Han cia dusa'lautu, mundaza'a asu kilim cia ti.
Han cia dosa'laoto, mondaza'a aso kilim cia ti.
S.TRANSL: 他在二樓，你上去找他吧。
He’s upstairs. You can go up and find him.

S.FORM: Uu Bazai qana, talbuntuking nitu pasaduu, macial asu?
Uo Bazai qana, talbontoking nito pasadoo, macial aso?
S.TRANSL: 是Bazai阿，很久沒有看到你了，你好嗎?
It’s Bazai. I haven’t seen you in a while! How have you been?

S.FORM: Macial na! maipati caak kilim su'un pababazbaz.
Macial na! maipati caak kilim so'on pababazbaz.
S.TRANSL: I’m doing great! I came to chat with you.

S.FORM: Iha'an cia pitdai'an makal'ing i sanglav, luklacan zaku.
Iha'an cia pitdai'an makal'ing i sanglav, loklacan zako.
S.TRANSL: 他在廚房炒菜，我去叫他。
He’s in the kitchen cooking. Let me go call him.

S.FORM: Maipa cia tulkukan madamu kis tulkuk.
Maipa cia tolkokan madamo kis tolkok.
S.TRANSL: She went to the chicken coop to catch chickens.

S.FORM: Uka' qudasnanaz muu han lumaq, iha'an cia quma, hanamu lumaq mantatala cia mucuqais.
Uka' qodasnanaz moo han lomaq, iha'an cia qoma, hanamo lomaq mantatala cia mocoqais.
S.TRANSL: 你們的爺爺不在家，他在田裡，你們在家等他回來吧。
Your grandfather is not at home. He’s in the field. Wait for him to come back.

S.FORM: Talmuntuking nitu pasaduu, taldaqvasing asu ki.
Talmontoking nito pasadoo, taldaqvasing aso ki.
S.TRANSL: I haven’t seen you in a while. You’ve grown taller.
It’s so good to see you.

S.FORM: paimuu ca unglai dii, pukumbu'is piskazhavan.
paimoo ca onglai dii, pokombo'is piskazhavan.
S.TRANSL: 這是給你們的鳳梨，要放到冰箱裡。
Here’s a pineapple for you. Put it in the refrigerator.

S.FORM: talmuntuking nitu' pasaduu, luklacunku nai muskun maun qaising ti.
talmontoking nito' pasadoo, loklaconko nai moskon maon qaising ti.
S.TRANSL: 這麼久沒來，我叫大家一起來吃飯。
It’s been a while. Let’s have a meal together.

S.FORM: Bazing nii, maqtu'ing ca qu'in savil, maipa ata pulungqu'an pababazbaz ti.
Bazing nii, maqto'ing ca qo'in savil, maipa ata polongqo'an pababazbaz ti.
S.TRANSL: 不用麻煩了，我喝茶就好，我們來客廳聊天。
No need to bother. I’ll just have tea. Let’s sit in the living room and chat.

S.FORM: Miqumicang isu tu malkacia tantunguan, namudanin caak.
Miqomicang iso to malkacia tantongoan, namodanin caak.
S.TRANSL: 謝謝你的招待，我要回去了。
Thank you for your hospitality. I have to go now.

S.FORM: Laupang ca tulkuk dii sintunu, dasi nadaukdaukun suu ma'un.
Laopang ca tolkok dii sintono, dasi nadaokdaokon soo ma'on.
S.TRANSL: 這隻雞剛殺好，你帶回去慢慢吃。
This chicken was just freshly killed. Take it home and enjoy it slowly.

S.FORM: Maqtu ata patataqu' ca laqbing mina'unin?
Maqto ata patataqo' ca laqbing mina'onin?
S.TRANSL: 我和您約明天下午好嗎?
Can I make an appointment with you tomorrow afternoon?

S.FORM: Han ata sipulan pasaduu ti? nasiza'an ata qaningu.
Han ata sipolan pasadoo ti? nasiza'an ata qaningo.
S.TRANSL: 我們約學校好嗎?我們要錄影。
How about meeting at school? We need to shoot a video.

S.FORM: Maipa ata ulu'nunan ti? napainuk caak i hulucbunun maipata.
Maipa ata olo'nonan ti? napainok caak i holocbonon maipata.
S.TRANSL: 那去聚會所好了，我會穿族服去。
Then let’s go to the community center. I’ll wear folk costume.

S.FORM: Manau'az hala qai dandan han acang nam, kilimi caak ca kapuaqin.
Manao'az hala qai dandan han acang nam, kilimi caak ca kapoaqin.
S.TRANSL: 我們部落的櫻花盛開很漂亮。等花開的時候你來找我吧!
The cherry blossoms in our tribe are beautiful when they bloom. Come find me when the flowers bloom!

S.FORM: Namaltatalavang pancan nangqatqanin ca, madia'ang qanin antala'an pa!
Namaltatalavang pancan nangqatqanin ca, madia'ang qanin antala'an pa!
S.TRANSL: 那要等到春天，太晚了吧!
That would have to wait until spring. It’s too late, isn’t it?
那你感恩祭的時候來吧!
Then come during our Thanksgiving Festival!
Alright! I’m looking forward to it!

S.FORM: Makuacuna uzav asu mucuqais han acang miqumic?
Makoacona ozav aso mocoqais han acang miqomic?
S.TRANSL: 請問你為甚麼要搬回部落生活?
May I ask why you decided to move back to the tribe?
I want to return to teach at the local school.

S.FORM: mazang asu nitu han bukzav mintataqu'?
mazang aso nito han bokzav mintataqo'?
S.TRANSL: Why not teach in the city?

S.FORM: Maupa'i minasakak acang nak, maqtuang amin patcuqais i acang.
Maopa'i minasakak acang nak, maqtoang amin patcoqais i acang.
S.TRANSL: 因為我懷念我的故鄉，也希望能回饋部落。
Because I miss my hometown and I also want to give back to the tribe.

S.FORM: Manananu hala asu matinun, cima taqu su'un i?
Mananano hala aso matinon, cima taqo so'on i?
S.TRANSL: 你很會織布，是誰教你的?
You’re very skilled at weaving, who taught you?

S.FORM: Ciat qudasnau'az naak, mantan a cia mananaun matinun han acang nam.
Ciat qodasnao'az naak, mantan a cia mananaon matinon han acang nam.
S.TRANSL: 是我的奶奶，她是我們部落最會織布的人。
It was my grandmother, she is the most skilled weaver in our tribe.

S.FORM: Makuacuna asa asu pisqanciap i matinun?
Makoacona asa aso pisqanciap i matinon?
S.TRANSL: How did you develop an interest in learning weaving?

S.FORM: Maupa'i iniqumican nam ca matinun, asatu minsauqaqabas ca iniqumican dii.
Maopa'i iniqomican nam ca matinon, asato minsaoqaqabas ca iniqomican dii.
S.TRANSL: 織布是我們的文化，我想要讓文化延續。
Weaving is a part of our culture, and I want to ensure its continuity.

S.FORM: Mantan macial qudan ca davuc dii.
Mantan macial qodan ca davoc dii.
Mantatan asu ki, talmuntuun ca mataqbu' dii?
Mantatan aso ki, talmontoon ca mataqbo' dii?
S.TRANSL: 你真厲害，這要釀很久嗎?
You’re really talented. Does it take a long time to make?

S.FORM: Nii', maqtu'in ca tat'ulu'anin, mungausun ca dulaz matahun, nacusanin mukun mahilauq, namaqtu'in pukumbu'un i kal'ung.
Nii', maqto'in ca tat'olo'anin, mongaoson ca dolaz matahon, nacosanin mokon mahilaoq, namaqto'in pokombo'on i kal'ong.
S.TRANSL: 不用，大約一周就好了。把糯米和白米先蒸熟，再加入麴粉一起拌勻，就可以裝到甕裡了。
No, it only takes about a week. After steaming the sticky rice and white rice, we mix it with yeast powder, and then it can be stored in a jar.

S.FORM: haiza han dii daqpuut cin calubunun, mu'amin sincuaz i naak qai!
haiza han dii daqpoot cin calobonon, mo'amin sincoaz i naak qai!
S.TRANSL: 我這裡有辣椒和蕗蕎，都是我自己種的喔!
I have chili and lokiy, both grown by myself!

S.FORM: Asaunku ca huluc dii, mutpuk pia cui?
Asaonko ca holoc dii, motpok pia coi?
S.TRANSL: 我喜歡這件衣服，多少錢?
I like this piece of clothing. How much is it?
It’s too expensive. Can’t you lower the price a bit?

S.FORM: Nii' na, sung hala caak ca maqna'un mavanaq.
Nii' na, song hala caak ca maqna'on mavanaq.
S.TRANSL: No, if I lower it further, I’ll lose money.

S.FORM: Uu na! cia tas'a huluctaqdung ca siza'un zaku.
Uo na! cia tas'a holoctaqdong ca siza'on zako.
S.TRANSL: 好吧!那我要一件黑色的衣服。
Alright then, I’ll take a black piece of clothing.

S.FORM: Siza'un zaku ca viia cin kalung dii.
Siza'on zako ca viia cin kalong dii.
S.TRANSL: 我要這把刀和這個鍋子。
I want this knife and this pot.

S.FORM: Mutpuk dusa' sing, inakanak maku'ima sintas'i, maqtu talmuntu cukau'un.
Motpok dosa' sing, inakanak mako'ima sintas'i, maqto talmonto cokao'on.
S.TRANSL: 總共2000元，這是我自己手工打造的，保證可以用很久。
It’s a total of 2000 dollars. I handmade these, and they are guaranteed to last a long time.

S.FORM: Ciat kaviaz naak taqu zakun tu maipa'ati mabaliv, maqtu muqnang mavadaq tukuc?
Ciat kaviaz naak taqo zakon to maipa'ati mabaliv, maqto moqnang mavadaq tokoc?
S.TRANSL: 我介紹朋友來買，可以再便宜一些嗎?
I’ll introduce my friend to buy. Can you give a further discount?

S.FORM: Uu na, vadaqun zaku tukuc i.
Uo na, vadaqon zako tokoc i.
S.TRANSL: Alright! I’ll give you a discount.

S.FORM: Maipa'ang dii qamang saduu, maiza han dii huluc cin tamuhung balivun.
Maipa'ang dii qamang sadoo, maiza han dii holoc cin tamohong balivon.
S.TRANSL: 來看看喔!衣服帽子都有賣。
Come and take a look! We sell clothes and hats.

S.FORM: Macingav tu pia cui ca huluc dii?
Macingav to pia coi ca holoc dii?
Taau saba qan mahima'un ca ta'a huluc, maca taau ka mutpuk ta'a sing.
Taao saba qan mahima'on ca ta'a holoc, maca taao ka motpok ta'a sing.
S.TRANSL: One piece of clothing is 350 dollars, three pieces for 1000 dollars.

S.FORM: Maqtu'in ta'a ca balivunku, ci'ai baqlu ca isaiv zakun.
Maqto'in ta'a ca balivonko, ci'ai baqlo ca isaiv zakon.
S.TRANSL: 我買一件就好，請給我新的。
I’ll just buy one piece, please give me a new one.

S.FORM: Miqumicang, asa caak mabaliv i qaisingdulaz cin qasumaqav.
Miqomicang, asa caak mabaliv i qaisingdolaz cin qasomaqav.
S.TRANSL: 你好，我想要買糯米飯和山胡椒滷肉。
Hello, I would like to buy sticky rice and braised pork with maqaw pepper.

S.FORM: uka'in ca qaising, haizang ca tanapang, mabaliv asu?
oka'in ca qaising, haizang ca tanapang, mabaliv aso?
S.TRANSL: 飯賣完了。我還有刺蔥油餅，你要買嗎?
The rice is sold out. I have tana pancakes, would you like to buy them?

S.FORM: Uu ti, aiving tas'a, namaipati mabaliv qaising ca muqnin.
Uo ti, aiving tas'a, namaipati mabaliv qaising ca moqnin.
S.TRANSL: 好吧!請給我一份，我下次再來買飯。
Alright, please give me one. I’ll come back next time to buy rice.

S.FORM: Uu, kadangazunku asu makuciat kapa' mabatiqu, mutpuk mahima'un cui.
Uo, kadangazonko aso makociat kapa' mabatiqo, motpok mahima'on coi.
S.TRANSL: W：好，我幫你用袋子裝起來，這樣50元。
Okay, I’ll pack it in a bag for you. That’ll be 50 dollars.
